基于机器学习的模型可以预测多个种族的糖尿病发病率预测不同种族的 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 发病率和患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Machine-learning-based-models-can-predict-diabetes-incidence-across-several-ethnicities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Machine-learning-based-models-can-predict-diabetes-incidence-across-several-ethnicities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abd9ce8e-1ec0-4142-8c6f-b93d29ff6e25 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 06:04:00 -0400 Machine learning-based models can predict diabetes incidence across several ethnicities
在临床护理中利用人工智能技术：协作智能的使用协作智能以数字方式转变医疗保健服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Leveraging-AI-technologies-in-clinical-care-the-use-of-collaborative-intelligence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Leveraging-AI-technologies-in-clinical-care-the-use-of-collaborative-intelligence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79c5ca6f-6757-477e-8397-f1a13efd5c31 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 05:26:00 -0400 Leveraging AI technologies in clinical care: the use of collaborative intelligence
阵列 CRISPR 筛选彻底改变靶点发现在比利时布鲁塞尔举行的 SLAS EU 2023 上进行的采访中，我们采访了阿斯利康功能基因组学部门副主任 Ulrike Kuenzel，讨论了阵列 CRISPR 筛选在靶点识​​别等方面的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Arrayed-CRISPR-Screening-for-Revolutionizing-Target-Discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Arrayed-CRISPR-Screening-for-Revolutionizing-Target-Discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7857be48-b6a2-4d68-8bc7-9a56d816d3e7 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 05:13:00 -0400 Arrayed CRISPR Screening for Revolutionizing Target Discovery
微量营养素如何影响神经系统疾病？有关特定神经系统疾病的微量营养素的知识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/How-do-micro Nutritions-influence-neurological-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/How-do-micro Nutritions-influence-neurological-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc082281-5810-4bcf-98de-1ce096d5ffa5 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 05:00:00 -0400 How do micronutrients influence neurological disorders?
不同的富含多酚的食物如何影响慢性疾病？植物化学物质在促进人类健康饮食以对抗慢性疾病方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/How-do- Different-polyphen-rich-foods-impact-chronic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/How-do- Different-polyphen-rich-foods-impact-chronic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8fb0ad4-1224-45b6-8a82-c0e4e9bc34de Wed, 27 Sep 2023 04:08:00 -0400 How do different polyphenol-rich foods impact chronic diseases?
美国人为地球吃得怎么样？新指数揭示可持续饮食的差距和机遇该研究引入了美国行星健康饮食指数（PHDI-US），以评估美国成年人对营养和环境可持续饮食的坚持程度。研究结果揭示了基于种族、收入和其他人口因素的依从性的显着差异，为促进可持续饮食习惯提供了重要的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/How-well-do-Americans-eat-for-the-planet-New-index-reveals-gaps-and-opportunities-in-sustainable-diets。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/How-well-do-Americans-eat-for-the-planet-New-index-reveals-gaps-and-opportunities-in-sustainable-diets。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cf7b3cf-f6e2-477e-931c-38d1e3c9cd62 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 02:16:00 -0400 How well do Americans eat for the planet? New index reveals gaps and opportunities in sustainable diets
尽管社交媒体激增，但流行病封锁减少了与自拍相关的死亡人数尽管社交媒体使用量激增，但 COVID-19 大流行导致与自拍相关的死亡人数大幅减少。研究表明，封锁和旅行限制限制了危险自拍的机会，凸显了采取新预防策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Pandemic-lockdowns-reduced-selfie-lated-fatalities-despite-social-media-surge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230927/Pandemic-lockdowns-reduced-selfie-lated-fatalities-despite-social-media-surge.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11e8601f-66b1-42a5-99f2-8214e7671128 Wed, 27 Sep 2023 01:54:00 -0400 Pandemic lockdowns reduced selfie-related fatalities despite social media surge
早期喂养实践是塑造终生口腔微生物群的关键研究深入探索了婴儿口腔微生物组的鲜为人知的世界，研究了早期营养和环境因素如何塑造它。该研究对终身健康具有影响，旨在指导未来的健康建议，强调需要更多的纵向研究和先进的测序技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Early-feeding-practices-key-to-shaping-lifelong-oral-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Early-feeding-practices-key-to-shaping-lifelong-oral-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e289debf-7caa-4ef3-97e5-308586fe64ab Tue, 26 Sep 2023 23:49:00 -0400 Early feeding practices key to shaping lifelong oral microbiome
蘑菇衍生产品能否成为预防肺癌的未来？研究人员发现，一种蘑菇衍生产品 GLSF 有望减少烟草烟雾致癌物引起的小鼠肺毒性和肿瘤发展。这项研究为未来的临床试验打开了大门，有可能提供一种天然的肺癌预防措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Could-a-mushroom-衍生-产品-be-the-future-of-lung-cancer-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Could-a-mushroom-衍生-产品-be-the-future-of-lung-cancer-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80e28189-1090-4127-8806-d0e92bc84277 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 23:25:00 -0400 Could a mushroom-derived product be the future of lung cancer prevention?
你的海鲜安全吗？新研究揭示太平洋海洋生物的毒素水平惊人发表在《总体环境科学》杂志上的一篇研究论文探讨了太平洋水生动物体内残留毒素水平的增加如何对食品安全、人类健康和粮食保障造成严重风险。该文件概述了各种类型的毒素、其来源及其对海洋生物和人类健康的影响，强调了有效干预措施的紧迫性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Is-your-seafood-safe-New-study-reveals-alarming-levels-of-toxins-in-Pacific-Ocean-marine-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230926/Is-your-seafood-safe-New-study-reveals-alarming-levels-of-toxins-in-Pacific-Ocean-marine-life.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80a9859b-5a43-45a3-b3bd-3cc755d322f4 Tue, 26 Sep 2023 23:07:00 -0400 Is your seafood safe? New study reveals alarming levels of toxins in Pacific Ocean marine life
